views.markdown: Adds a speed button to the video overlay where you can directly change the video speed. Also add more video speeds to choose from.
- Fixed the icon of minus button not being displayed on old YouTube versions

- Fixed tapping on speed presets not dismissing the dialog
- Fixed speed presets not being aligned correctly in RTL languages

- Added speed presets to the speed slider dialog
- Removed the now redundant hook

- Improved the style of plus and minus buttons in the speed slider dialog
- Fixed plus and minus buttons not having background color in light mode

- Added increase and decrease speed buttons to the speed slider dialog
- Tweaked the speed slider dialog UI
- Fixed the current speed slider value not updating correctly
- Added the ability to replace the primitive video speed selector with a slider, for more precise speed selection
- Added the ability to replace the default video speed selector with the primitive one, where custom speeds can be added
- Fixed video speed button not updating when changing the video speed on old YouTube versions
- Added more video speeds to choose from, configured from YTVideoOverlay settings

- Removed unused code
- Fixed vi localization not working
- Added th localization
